attributes.additional_details: Restore the budget to 0.7% of GNI.
attributes.background: The government just voted to reduce this to 0.5% indefinitely. However, the British Public are in support of keeping it at 0.7% as a country that cares for others and owes many other countries support through historical acts of negligence.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/590348
